subject: Sleep
title: Sleeping Before Learning
description: A short lesson to help you apply Sleeping Before Learning.

hook.text: Most people know sleep after studying helps. But sleep before studying matters just as much.

buildup.text: The hippocampus has limited capacity. It fills up during the day as you absorb new information.

discovery.text: Sleep clears the hippocampus, moving yesterday's data to the cortex and freeing space for new learning.

twist.text: Sleep-deprived students showed 40 percent less hippocampal activity when trying to form new memories.

climax.text: An all-nighter before an exam doesn't just waste study time. It cripples the brain's ability to encode.

punchline.text: Sleep before learning clears the inbox for new data.

quiz.question: Why is sleep before learning important?
options: It clears hippocampal space for new memory encoding
It makes textbooks easier to read
